text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙa Alloh taolo va pajomʙaras va kitoʙe, ki ʙar u nozil kardaast va [ʙa har] kitoʙe, ki pes az in firistodaast, imon ʙijovared [va ʙar on pojdor ʙosed] va har, ki ʙa Alloh taolo va faristagoni U va kitoʙhovu pajomʙaronas va ruzi qijomat kufr ʙivarzad, ʙe tardid, dar gumrohii duru daroze aftodaast
